page.title: 04*******Somerby Church*******
page.content:
The church is called All Saints. It is on the main street of Somerby. There is one vicar for three churches one at Pickwell,Burrough and Somerby, all the churches are about the same size. There is a lay precher who comes around to teach us about Jews and God! The Vicar does a junior church on a Tuesday night at five o'clock. We have an organ player who is my nana. We don't use the big altar we use use a little altar. We have had a new heater at the bottom of the seats.
Written by Lucy Wright. aged 10 yrs.
